p: Combined application treatment (pyrochar and thermal desorption) increased proline contents by 25% and 32% under 10% and 20% contamination, respectively, pyrochar showed less increase in proline contents (6% under control, 18% at 10% contamination and 9% at 20% contamination), whereas thermal desorption resulted in (25% increase under control conditions, 30% at 10% contamination and 28% at 10% contamination., with respect to respective control).
